name: js-yaml-cloudformation-schema
description: Schema to allow js-yaml to process YAML formatted CloudFormation templates that use short form syntax for intrinsic functions while parsing or dumping

scripts.sort-tags.json: command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 &&(jq -S '' tags.json )>tags.sorted.json&&mv tags.sorted.json tags.json || { echo 'jq is not install or not in $PATH' >&2; exit 0; }

author: Dan MacTough <danmactough@gmail.com>
